languages.text: "Я не получал сообщений из инженариума о сбоях в Поле Геллера... но связь была нестабильна еще полчаса назад, а сейчас воксы молчат. Какова бы ни была причина, последствия стремительно распространяются: я получаю отрывочные сведения со средних палуб, а с нижних отсеков в одностороннем порядке транслируют еретическую галиматью". {n}Кунрад медлит.{/n} "То, что безумцы уже проникли на офицерскую палубу, говорит о чем-то более подготовленном. Возможно, на корабле организованный бунт".

traits.locale_text: "Я не получал сообщений из инженариума о сбоях в Поле Геллера... но связь была нестабильна еще полчаса назад, а сейчас воксы молчат. Какова бы не была причина, последствия стремительно распространяются: я получаю отрывочные сведения со средних палуб, а с нижних отсеков в одностороннем порядке транслируют еретическую галиматью". {n}Кунрад медлит.{/n} "То, что безумцы уже проникли на офицерскую палубу, говорит о чем-то более подготовленном. Возможно, на корабле организованный бунт".

languages.text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."
languages.original_text: "Я не получал сообщений из инженариума о сбоях в Поле Геллера... но связь была нестабильна еще полчаса назад, а сейчас воксы молчат. Какова бы ни была причина, последствия стремительно распространяются: я получаю отрывочные сведения со средних палуб, а с нижних отсеков в одностороннем порядке транслируют еретическую галиматью". {n}Кунрад медлит.{/n} "То, что безумцы уже проникли на офицерскую палубу, говорит о чем-то более подготовленном. Возможно, на корабле организованный бунт".

traits.locale_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller Field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and vox-casts from the lower bays are nothing from heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

languages.text: “引擎区还没有发来任何关于盖勒力场发生故障的报告……但音阵通讯早在半个小时之前就已经很不稳定了，现在完全停止了。虽然不知道是什么原因导致了故障，但混乱正在迅速蔓延。我收到了来自中层甲板的零星报告。至于底层甲板，我唯一收到的信息，就是充满异端言论的胡言乱语。”{n}维特威尔顿了顿。{/n}“这群疯子已经冲到了军官甲板，这说明这场暴行是早有预谋的。这或许是一场有策划、有组织的叛乱。”
languages.original_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

traits.locale_text: “引擎区还没有发来任何关于盖勒力场发生故障的报告……但音阵通讯早在半个小时之前就已经很不稳定了，现在完全停止了。虽然不知道是什么原因导致了故障，但混乱正在迅速蔓延。我收到了来自中层甲板的零星报告。至于底层甲板，我唯一收到的信息，就是充满异端言论的胡言乱语。”{n}维特威尔顿了顿。{/n}“这群疯子已经冲到了军官甲板，这说明这场暴行是早有预谋的。这或许是一场有策划、有组织的叛乱。”

languages.text: «Aún no he recibido información del ingeniarium respecto a posibles fallos del campo Geller... pero las comunicaciones ya eran inestables hace media hora, y ahora han cesado por completo. Sea cual sea la causa, sus consecuencias se extienden rápidamente. Recibo informes aislados de las cubiertas intermedias, y las únicas transmisiones de vocos de las bahías inferiores son delirios herejes unilaterales». {n}Voigtvir hace una pausa.{/n} «El hecho de que los locos hayan llegado ya a la cubierta de oficiales indica que este absurdo estaba planeado. Es posible que se trate de un motín organizado».
languages.original_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

traits.locale_text: «Aún no he recibido información del ingeniarium respecto a posibles fallos del campo Geller... pero las comunicaciones ya eran inestables hace media hora, y ahora han cesado por completo. Sea cual sea la causa, sus consecuencias se extienden rápidamente. Recibo informes aislados de las cubiertas intermedias, y las únicas transmisiones de vocos de las bahías inferiores son delirios herejes unilaterales». {n}Voigtvir hace una pausa.{/n} «El hecho de que los locos hayan llegado ya a la cubierta de oficiales indica que este absurdo estaba planeado. Es posible que se trate de un motín organizado».

languages.text: 「ゲラーフィールドの障害に関するエンジナリウムからの連絡はまだ受けていません…しかし、通信は30分前にすでに不安定でしたが、現在は完全に停止しています。原因が何であれ、影響は急速に広がっています。中層デッキからは散在的なレポートを受け取っていますが下のベイからのヴォクスキャストは一方的な異端的なでたらめだけです」{n}ボイトヴィルは一旦息を継ぐ。{/n}「狂人たちがすでに士官デッキにいるということは、この暴挙が事前に計画されていたことを示唆しています。おそらくこれは組織的な反乱でしょう」
languages.original_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

traits.locale_text: 「ゲラーフィールドの障害に関するエンジナリウムからの連絡はまだ受けていません…しかし、通信は30分前にすでに不安定でしたが、現在は完全に停止しています。原因が何であれ、影響は急速に広がっています。中央のデッキからは散在的なレポートを受け取っていますが下のベイからのヴォクスキャストは一方的な異端的な意味不明なものだけです」{n}ボイドヴィルは一旦息を継ぐ。{/n}「「狂人たちがすでに将校デッキにいるということは、この暴挙が事前に計画されていたことを示唆しています。おそらくこれは組織的な反乱でしょう」

「ゲラーフィールドの障害に関するエンジナリウムからの連絡はまだ受けていません…しかし、通信は30分前にすでに不安定でしたが、現在は完全に停止しています。原因が何であれ、影響は急速に広がっています。中層デッキからは散在的なレポートを受け取っていますが下のベイからのヴォクスキャストは一方的な異端的なでたらめだけです」{n}ボイトヴィルは一旦息を継ぐ。{/n}「狂人たちがすでに士官デッキにいるということは、この暴挙が事前に計画されていたことを示唆しています。おそらくこれは組織的な反乱でしょう」

languages.text: « J'attends encore des nouvelles de l'enginarium concernant de possibles défaillances du champ de Geller... mais les communications étaient déjà instables il y a une demi-heure et elles ont maintenant cessé. Quelles qu'en soient les causes, les conséquences se propagent rapidement. Je reçois des rapports irréguliers des ponts intermédiaires et les seules transmissions-vox des baies inférieures ne sont qu'un ramassis de logorrhée hérétique. » {n}Voigtvir s'interrompt.{/n} « Le fait que les fous ont déjà atteint le pont des officiers laisse penser que cette action a été soigneusement planifiée. Il s'agit peut-être d'une mutinerie organisée. »
languages.original_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

traits.locale_text: « J'attends encore des nouvelles de l'enginarium concernant de possibles défaillances du champ de Geller... mais les communications étaient déjà instables il y a une demi-heure et elles ont maintenant cessé. Quelles qu'en soient les causes, les conséquences se propagent rapidement. Je reçois des rapports irréguliers des ponts intermédiaires et les seules transmissions-vox des baies inférieures ne sont qu'un ramassis de logorrhée hérétique. » {n}Voigtvir s'interrompt.{/n} « Le fait que les fous ont déjà atteint le pont des officiers laisse penser que cette action a été soigneusement planifiée. Il s'agit peut-être d'une mutinerie organisée. »

languages.text: "Ich habe noch keine Meldung bezüglich Ausfällen des Gellerfelds aus dem Maschinarium erhalten ... aber die Kommunikation war schon vor einer halben Stunde instabil und ist jetzt komplett zusammengebrochen. Was immer die Ursache sein mag, die Konsequenzen breiten sich rasch aus. Ich empfange vereinzelte Berichte von den mittleren Decks, und die einzigen Vox-Übertragungen aus den unteren Buchten sind ketzerischer Unsinn." {n}Voigtvir hält kurz inne.{/n} "Dass die Wahnsinnigen bereits das Offiziersdeck erreicht haben, lässt vermuten, dass der Aufstand geplant war. Es handelt sich möglicherweise um eine organisierte Meuterei."
languages.original_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe noch keine Meldung bezüglich Ausfällen des Gellerfelds aus dem Maschinarium erhalten ... aber die Kommunikation war schon vor einer halben Stunde instabil und ist jetzt komplett zusammengebrochen. Was immer die Ursache sein mag, die Konsequenzen breiten sich rasch aus. Ich empfange vereinzelte Berichte von den mittleren Decks, und die einzigen Vox-Übertragungen aus den unteren Buchten sind ketzerischer Unsinn." {n}Voigtvir hält kurz inne.{/n} "Dass die Wahnsinnigen bereits das Offiziersdeck erreicht haben, lässt vermuten, dass der Aufstand geplant war. Es handelt sich möglicherweise um eine organisierte Meuterei."

languages.text: "Mühendishaneden herhangi bir Geller alanı arızası haberi gelmedi. Haberleşme hatlarında yarım saat önce bozulmalar başladı, şimdi de iletişim tamamen kesildi. Sebep her ne olursa olsun, sonuçları hızla yayılıyor. Orta güvertelerden bölük pörçük raporlar alıyorum ve alt bölmelerden gelen tek voks yayını da tek yönlü kâfirce zırvalardan ibaret." {n}Voigtvir duraklıyor.{/n} "Delirenlerin subay güvertesine dek erişebilmiş olması, bu rezaletin önceden planlandığı izlenimini uyandırıyor. Örgütlü bir isyanla karşı karşıya olabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I have not yet received word from the enginarium regarding any Geller field failures... but communications were already unstable half an hour ago, and now they have ceased altogether. Whatever the cause may be, the consequences are spreading fast. I am receiving scattered reports from the middle decks, and the only vox-casts from the lower bays are one-way heretical gibberish." {n}Voigtvir pauses.{/n} "That the madmen have already reached the officers' deck suggests that this outrage was planned in advance. Perhaps this is an organised mutiny."

Orta güvertelerden bölük pörçük raporlar alıyorum ve alt bölmelerden gelen tek voks yayını da tek yönlü kâfirce zırvalardan ibaret." {n}Voigtvir duraklıyor.{/n} "Delirenlerin subay güvertesine dek erişebilmiş olması, bu rezaletin önceden planlandığı izlenimini uyandırıyor. Örgütlü bir isyanla karşı karşıya olabiliriz."
